attributes.additional_details:
I would like to start this e-petition on behave of everyone.

I ask the government to seriously look at this website and shut it down and it is the duty of the government to safeguard each individual in the uk and this website has broken laws hear there and everywhere.

this one is a policy and procedure.

◾Protecting you from abuse.
◾Preventing harm to your health or development.
◾Making sure you are safe and well looked after.
◾Helping you gain good life chances and enter adulthood successfully.

This website has failed to do this and the family's of the poor children what have been subject to abuse, bullying ,threatening  behaviour. It's wrong and the government should do something about this as how many more children life's is it going to take for are government to act. Act now to protect  life's and to stop Cyberbullying in the UK.
